issue.title: [CF 703] Icon type totem have a litte error
issue.body:
When i logon my warlock or monk, it still in my icon type.


> Posted by CurseForge user lsjyzjl | Imported from CurseForge issue #703 | Raw

comments.body:
It is supposd to be there. Sometimes Blizzard adds things that can be tracked as a totem (like mage Rune of Power), and I don't want to lock people out of tracking it as so just because I haven't figured it out yet.


> Posted by CurseForge user Cybeloras
